EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining our webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/agile/webinar/domain-driven-design]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for attending our webinar on Domain Driven Design (DDD) and Reactive Programming.
Vaughn Vernon gave us some valuable insights on how a good domain model can reduce complexity and avoid having your application become a ‘big ball of mud’. He also discussed how bounded contexts are a good approach to designing microservices. Wes Williams showed us how an in-memory data grid like Pivotal’s GemFire can be used for implementing microservices and communicating across bounded contexts using the principles of Reactive Programming.
The webinar recording is now available <[[https://pivotal.io/agile/webinar/domain-driven-design-and-reactive-programming]]> for on-demand access. Please feel free to pass this information onto any of your interested colleagues..
Access the recording here <[[https://pivotal.io/agile/webinar/domain-driven-design-and-reactive-programming]]>.
Below please find some other resources that you might find interesting. Scale your data services on demand to support high-performance, real-time apps with Pivotal GemFire:
- Features, benefits and use cases can be found here <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-gemfire]]> - Free Introduction to GemFire online course <[[https://pivotal.io/academy/course/introduction-to-gemfire]]> - Github locations for the webinar demo (DDD <[[https://github.com/VaughnVernon/IDDD_NYSE]]>, Kafka <[[https://github.com/reactor/reactor-kafka]]>)
Check out the Open Source Apache Geode data management platform that provides real-time, consistent access to data-intensive apps:
- Apache site <[[http://geode.apache.org/]]> with software, documentation - Customer and technical presentations from Pivotal’s Geode Summit <[[https://2016.event.geodesummit.com/schedule]]>
Help independent teams ship software more often with microservices:
- Taking on the Monolith with People and Tech - excerpts from SpringOne Platform 2016 <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/taking-on-the-monolith-with-people-and-tech-springone-platform-day-2]]> - Pivotal Insights Podcast: Episode 2 - Intro To Data Microservices <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/introduction-to-data-microservices]]>
We’ll let you know when we have other events on the same or similar topics.
Regards,
The Pivotal Team
